export_tool_status.name: export_ha_session.py
export_tool_status.purpose: Export BOX session from HA payloads.db for offline replay
export_tool_status.functionality: Can connect to HA via SSH, query payloads.db, extract frames by conn_id

replay_tool_status.name: replay_session_file.py
replay_tool_status.purpose: Replay exported HA BOX session to direct cloud target
replay_tool_status.functionality: Can read exported session file, replay frames with timing to cloud target

session_data_available.contains: BOX to proxy frames with full XML data

capabilities_verified.details: export_ha_session.py can extract real session data from HA payloads.db
replay_session_file.py can replay exported frames to cloud target
Contains actual frames from conn_id 2315 with complete XML structure
Both tools support configurable parameters (host, port, timeout, etc.)

procedures_documented: Export: Run export_ha_session.py with --ssh-host to extract session from HA
Replay: Run replay_session_file.py with --session-file pointing to exported JSON
Monitor: Tools provide JSON output for tracking replay progress

readiness_status.t6_dependencies: PENDING - T6 scripts not yet created

notes: Replay capabilities are fully functional and verified
Real session data from HA payloads.db is available for testing
Tools provide comprehensive logging and error handling
T6 comparison suite scripts are pending creation (not blocking current verification)
